name: Casino I
overview: Casino I: Blackjack/Roulette contains two games. Blackjack implements the typical Las Vegas rules of the card game. Players try to get a card value of 21 or as close as possible without going bust. Roulette is another casino game where the player can bet on number and colors on a spinning wheel. The game comes with full disclosure of the odds so that players can try out strategies they want to use in casinos.
